metadata.title: CVE-2020-35525 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In SQlite 3.31.1, a potential null pointer derreference was found in theINTERSEC query processing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.5+esm1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.5+esm1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.5+esm1
sqlite3 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.5+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-1ubuntu1.5+esm1').
